DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate extracorporeal shock wave therapy effective sham treatment patient trapezial-metacarpal osteoarthritis pain relief functional improvement .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Extracorporeal Shock Wave Therapy Treatment Trapezial-Metacarpal Osteoarthritis . A Double Blind Randomized Controlled Study .
DOC.criteria: accord Eaton et al . classification inclusion criterion involve patient stage III , participant history 6 month pain 18 year age old . Exclusion criterion also presence degenerative nondegenerative neurologic condition , pain perception alter , history coagulopathy , cancer , cardiac pacemaker , calcaneal fracture , pregnancy .
